snippet.title: (GAMEPLAY TRAILER) Mobs 'N Monsters Launches on Steam April 11
snippet.description:
In Mobs 'N Monsters, you'll manage a spooky castle of monsters & fend off angry mobs with Slingshot action in this Physics-based Tower-Defense RTS. Fling vampires, mummies, & more to make the local villages crumble. Upgrade your units & castle between battles for impenetrable defenses & cause monstrous destruction!

Demo Available now!

Full game releases April 11, 2025.

Steam Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3277990/Mobs_N_Monsters/
